attributes.action: scrap the imunity laws for mp's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we call on the pm to scrap the imunity law.with all lies and spin by mp's and some civil servants covered by so called imunity laws.with all the lies and and problems caused by untrustworthy members of parliment who use the emunity laws to escape the same laws we have to abide by.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
